entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:11 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 04:30 AM NDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: 33 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to wet snow before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Blowing snow. Snowfall amount 10 cm except 20 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed areas. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 inland and over higher terrain. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Wet snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Wet snow at times mixed with rain ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
